mapper.select: select count(*) from b_owner_info where owner_id=#{user_id}
select owner_id, owner_name, owner_email, owner_password, owner_phone, owner_image_name from b_owner_info where owner_id=#{owner_id}
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name, s.store_address, s.store_image_name FROM b_store_tbl s WHERE s.owner_id = #{owner_id}

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_time, od.order_detail_id, od.store_id, od.store_address, od.toowner as owner_request, od.torider as rider_request, od.order_status, od.totalprice, s.store_name FROM b_order_tbl o JOIN b_order_detail_tbl od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN b_store_tbl s ON od.store_id = s.store_id WHERE s.owner_id = #{owner_id} ORDER BY o.order_time DESC

SELECT mi.menu_item_id, mi.menu_name, mi.price as menu_price, mi.image_name, oo.order_option_id, oq.quantity, LISTAGG(ot.option_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ot.option_name) as option_names, LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(ot.option_price), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ot.option_name) as option_prices, SUM(COALESCE(ot.option_price, 0)) as total_option_price, (mi.price + SUM(COALESCE(ot.option_price, 0))) * oq.quantity as item_total_price FROM b_order_tbl o JOIN b_order_detail_tbl od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN order_option_tbl oo ON oo.order_id = o.order_id JOIN b_menu_item_tbl mi ON oo.menu_item_id = mi.menu_item_id LEFT JOIN b_option_tbl ot ON ot.option_id = oo.option_id LEFT JOIN order_quantity_tbl oq ON oq.order_option_id = oo.order_option_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND mi.store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY mi.menu_item_id, mi.menu_name, mi.price, mi.image_name, oo.order_option_id, oq.quantity ORDER BY mi.menu_name

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_time, od.store_address, od.toowner as owner_request, od.torider as rider_request, od.order_status, od.totalprice, od.payment_method, u.user_name, u.user_phone FROM b_order_tbl o JOIN b_order_detail_tbl od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN b_user_info u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, r.GROUP_ID, r.PARENT_ID, r.ORDER_NO, r.ORDER_ID, r.REVIEW_CONTENT, r.RATING, r.WRITE_DATE, r.STORE_ID, r.USER_ID, r.REVIEW_TITLE, r.REVIEW_IMAGE_NAME, s.STORE_NAME, u.USER_NAME, o.OWNER_IMAGE_NAME, o.OWNER_ID FROM B_REVIEW_TBL r JOIN B_STORE_TBL s ON r.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN B_USER_INFO u ON r.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN B_OWNER_INFO o ON s.STORE_ID = o.OWNER_ID WHERE r.STORE_ID = #{store_id}

SELECT owner_coupon_id, cp_name, sale_price, owner_id, TO_CHAR(issued_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issued_date, TO_CHAR(expire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as expire_date, (total_quantity - NVL(store_used_quantity, 0)) as total_quantity FROM b_owner_coupon_tbl WHERE (owner_id = #{ownerId} OR owner_id IS NULL) AND expire_date >= SYSDATE ORDER BY expire_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_owner_coupon_tbl ( owner_coupon_id, cp_name, sale_price, owner_id, issued_date, expire_date, total_quantity ) VALUES ( owner_coupon_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cp_name}, #{sale_price}, #{minimum_purchase}, #{owner_id}, #{store_id}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{expire_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{total_quantity}, #{remaining_quantity} )
mapper.update: UPDATE b_owner_coupon_tbl SET cp_name = #{cp_name}, sale_price = #{sale_price}, minimum_purchase = #{minimum_purchase}, expire_date = TO_DATE(#{expire_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), total_quantity = #{total_quantity}, remaining_quantity = #{remaining_quantity} WHERE owner_coupon_id = #{owner_coupon_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.store_coupon_id, sc.store_id, s.store_name as store_name, sc.owner_coupon_id, sc.cp_name, sc.quantity, NVL(sc.used_quantity, 0) as used_qty, (sc.quantity - NVL(sc.used_quantity, 0)) as remaining_qty, sc.minimum_purchase, TO_CHAR(sc.expire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as expire_date FROM b_store_coupon_tbl sc JOIN b_store_tbl s ON sc.store_id = s.store_id WHERE sc.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND sc.expire_date >= SYSDATE ORDER BY sc.expire_date, s.store_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_store_coupon_tbl ( store_coupon_id, store_id, owner_coupon_id, quantity, expire_date, owner_id, cp_name, minimum_purchase, used_quantity ) VALUES ( #{store_coupon_id}, #{store_id}, #{owner_coupon_id}, #{quantity}, TO_DATE(#{expire_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{owner_id}, #{cp_name}, #{minimum_purchase}, #{used_quantity} )
insert into b_reply_tbl (reply_id, store_id, owner_id, order_id, reply_content, write_date) values (#{reply_id}, #{store_id}, #{owner_id}, #{order_id}, #{reply_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_ID as "reviewId", r.STORE_ID as "storeId", r.USER_ID as "userId", r.ORDER_ID as "orderId", r.REVIEW_TITLE as "reviewTitle", r.REVIEW_CONTENT as "reviewContent", r.REVIEW_IMAGE_NAME as "reviewImageName", r.WRITE_DATE as "reviewDate", r.RATING as "rating", p.REPLY_ID as "replyId", p.REPLY_CONTENT as "replyContent", p.WRITE_DATE as "replyDate", p.OWNER_ID as "ownerId", s.STORE_NAME as "storeName", u.USER_NAME as "userName", o.OWNER_NAME as "ownerName", o.OWNER_IMAGE_NAME as "ownerImageName" FROM b_review_tbl r LEFT JOIN b_store_tbl s ON r.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN b_user_info u ON r.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN b_reply_tbl p ON r.ORDER_ID = p.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN b_owner_info o ON p.OWNER_ID = o.OWNER_ID WHERE r.STORE_ID = #{storeId} ORDER BY r.WRITE_DATE DESC

select totalprice from b_order_detail_tbl where order_id = #{order_id}
